CustomField.formula: and( Not(CONTAINS(text(Line_of_business__c), 'Blended Oil Sales')) ,Not(CONTAINS(text(Line_of_business__c), 'Oil Filter')) ,Not(CONTAINS(text(Line_of_business__c), 'Oil Revenue')) ,Not(CONTAINS(text(Line_of_business__c), 'Oily Water')) ,Not(CONTAINS(text(Line_of_business__c), 'Parts Washing')) ,Not(CONTAINS(text(Line_of_business__c), 'Base Oil Sales')) ,Not(CONTAINS(text(Line_of_business__c), 'KPP')) ,Not(CONTAINS(text(Line_of_business__c), 'Specialty Refinery Products')) ,Not(CONTAINS(text(Line_of_business__c), 'Containerized Waste')) ,Not(CONTAINS(text(Line_of_business__c), 'Allied')) ,Not(CONTAINS(text(Line_of_business__c), 'Vac Services')) ,Not(CONTAINS(text(Line_of_business__c), 'RFO')) )
CustomField.label: TPM indicator
